channel.title: What am i supposed to do?
channel.description:
Me and my friend are roommates. We talk about normal guy stuff. He brought up the subject of our coach's daughter and how he loved her. Anyways, I told him to go for it and he did. A few weeks later my friend wakes me up at around 4 a.m. because of a call he recieved, our coach's daughter missed her period. So naturally, i threw my can of beer at his head and yelled at him. She turns out to be pregnant (i find out many months later when the baby comes out, he kept it away from me), my friend, the douchebag that he is makes everyone fucking take a test to see who the father is, because he won't come clean (why? I don't fucking know, it's as if no one else has a damn life and need to take this test).
Now, I have two problems. I've been getting high every day of the week, and my friend is a douchebag who isn't ready to be a father. What do we do?

item.title: What am i supposed to do?
item.dc:creator: @Death_by_Ill Death by Ill
item.description:
@Death_by_Ill wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:1, topic:168870”]Me and my friend are roommates. We talk about normal guy stuff. He brought up the subject of our coach’s daughter and how he loved her. Anyways, I told him to go for it and he did. A few weeks later my friend wakes me up at around 4 a.m. because of a call he recieved, our coach’s daughter missed her period. So naturally, i threw my can of beer at his head and yelled at him. She turns out to be pregnant (i find out many months later when the baby comes out, he kept it away from me), my friend, the douchebag that he is makes everyone fucking take a test to see who the father is, because he won’t come clean (why? I don’t fucking know, it’s as if no one else has a damn life and need to take this test).

Now, I have two problems. I’ve been getting high every day of the week, and my friend is a douchebag who isn’t ready to be a father. What do we do?[/quote]

Well…Try not getting high…

[/quote]

I would lol so hard if susie got preggers.[/quote]

item.title: What am i supposed to do?
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

You came for advice, and I’ll give.

If you really don’t want people knowing your on drugs, just ask a male friend with no STDs that isn’t related to the daughter, and isn’t the father. Put the pee in a small container, and for a few hours before you go to take the test, put the container in your armpit and walk around with it, this is because you need to keep your piss at body temperature. When your taking the test, transfer the pee, and your good to go. As for your friend, he’s gotta decide what he wants to do. If he doesn’t wanna stay with the girl, he’s still gonna have to pay child support. I don’t know how they do it where your from, but in Florida they will take away your license and put you in jail if you don’t pay. Either way, your friends pretty screwed unless she agrees to an abortion.

Read full topic

item.title: What am i supposed to do?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Why bother even asking advice? You don’t even seem to be asking for it. Your not saying ‘My friend does this, how do do i help him?’, or even ‘im on drugs, how do i get off?’

Tell your friend he’s a prick and to sort himself out, be a man. If he doesn’t, he’s going to hurt the kid for his dumb ass mistakes and its stupid and selfish. Yes the prospect of being a parent is scary but he must face up to it.

As for you. If your problem is getting high every week, and its a problem, then stop complaining about your life, get on and do something about it. Get off the drugs.

Read full topic
